OOC: Gotcha.  BTW, this'll be a 3-way split post ...

Rogue Star - Command Center::

"Give them everything we've got!  FIRE!!" Devilcat orders.  Noir's 
hand slams down on the firing switch, sending all four missiles 
thundering skyward.

"Take that, Autobots." Gatara growls as she watches the projectiles 
streak toward their target.

<><><><>

Rogue Star - Medbay::

"Oh, my achin' head ..." Jayde groans as she scrambles out of the CR 
tank.  "What happened?"

"We had to come and save your butt - as usual." Torin explains.  "When 
are you going to learn, Jayde?  Sooner or later your running off is 
going to get someone scrapped."

Jayde shakes her head as the memory of the battle comes back to her.
 "Hoo boy, am I gonna catch it or what."

<><><><>

Vindicator - Bridge::

*Seven Autobots are at their stations, ready for anything - or so they 
think.*

Pipes: Damage report - what did that wormhole do to us?

Powerglide: Shields took it on the chin, sir; it could take megacycles 
to get 'em back online.  Everything else is okay.

Warpath: BAM!  Tactical alert!  We got incoming missiles -ZOW!-, and 
fast!

Pipes: Hard to starboard!

Bluestreak: I'm trying!

*Bluestreak tries indeed, but it's too late; all four LRMs score 
direct hits.  Vindicator careens out of control.*

Powerglide: We're going down hard!  Fires in mid and aft sections!

Hound:  I'm on it!  Trailbreaker, this way!

*Hound and Trailbreaker leap from their seats, dashing back to combat 
the fires.*

Bluestreak: I ... think I've got it ...

*Straining, the pilot brings the ship back on a steady course - for 
now ...*

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Noir --
> 
> Noir nods, "I see."
> 
> Her attention is diverted to the scanners as Riekan's raised voice 
> calls out. The Predacons were indeed at it again.
> 
> The next scanner alert triggers memories. <...Vindicator...> She 
> thinks, then shudders slightly. 
> 
> "Yes Devilcat." Noir recovering and then quickly slides into a chair 
> on the side of the room, and begins tapping some buttons on the 
> console panel. Outside the Rogue Star, two identical panels open up 
> on both sides of the ship. After the sliding panels had completely 
> opened up, four ground to orbit LRM launchers rise up from the 
opened 
> compartments. The launchers swivel around, and aim themselves along 
a 
> trajectory to intercept the Vindicator.
> 
> On the 3d visual display at the front of the control room, the 
> trajectory is shown and a lock has been established on the enemy 
ship.
> 
> "Lock established Commander. Ready to launch at your command."
> 
> ooC: Cardhead, feel free to control Noir for the next few days if 
you 
> need too. (like for example if Noir is supposed to fire, the make 
her 
> fire the missiles.)
